name: LightCondMod.hom_naturality_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝ : Ring R
X Y : LightCondMod R
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
S T : Opposite LightProfinite
g : Quiver.Hom S T
x : ↑(X.val.obj S)
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (f.val.app T)) ((CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (X.val.map g)) x)) ((CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (Y.val.map g)) ((CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (f.val.app S)) x))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma hom_naturality_apply {X Y : LightCondMod.{u} R} (f : X ⟶ Y) {S T : LightProfiniteᵒᵖ}
    (g : S ⟶ T) (x : X.val.obj S) : f.val.app T (X.val.map g x) = Y.val.map g (f.val.app S x) :=
  NatTrans.naturality_apply f.val g x
